snippet: Breaking its silence on a rusty freighter seized by Panama and found to be carrying weapons for Cuba, North Korea demanded the ship’s release.
abstract: North Korea breaks four days of silence over rusty North Korean freighter impounded by Panama for concealing cargo of Cuban weapons, insisting that they were transported legally and demanding that Panamanian authorities immediately release vessel and its 35 detained crew members.

byline.contributor: Karla Zabludovsky contributed reporting from Mexico City.

lead_paragraph: Breaking its silence on a rusty freighter seized by Panama and found to be carrying weapons for Cuba, North Korea demanded the ship’s release.

headline.main: North Korea Says Freighter Carried Legal Load of Arms
headline.print_headline: North Korea Says Freighter Carried Legal Load of Arms
